text: Professor Anthony Smith CBE (14 March 1938 - 28 November 2021) was a British broadcaster, author and academic. He was President of Magdalen College, Oxford, between 1988 and 2005. He worked for the Annan Committee on The Future of Broadcasting, and became engaged in the national debate which led to the foundation of the UK's Channel 4. Smith died on 28 November 2021 in London from renal failure, aged 83.Anthony Smith CBE (1938–2021) President of Magdalen College 1988–2005 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Oxford Category:Writers from London
